title: An open source data science platform to build production-grade ML projects
text:
Context

Potential of big data sources and ML methods
Most of the work on the methological side

No formalization of relevant computing environments

Statisticians are increasingly trained in data science

Innovation potential is limited by IT environments

title: An open source data science platform to build production-grade ML projects
text:
Common challenges

Ability to scale computing resources

Distributed computing
GPUs

Availability of development environments

Flexibility to experiment
Fostering best development practices

Building production-ready solutions

Deployment of applications
Orchestratation of jobs
Monitoring tools

title: An open source data science platform to build production-grade ML projects
text:
Fostering innovation through autonomy

Onyxia: an open-source project to build modern data science environments for official statistics

Cloud technologies give statisticians more autonomy
Onyxia makes these technologies more accessible
No vendor lock-in

Reference platform for the AIML4OS project (WP3)
Feedback of our innovation strategy

Case study : how we operationalize MLOps at Insee
